heading: Today:
text: Showers, becoming scattered through NY, more numerous from VT east, possibly an isolated thunderstorm. Some breaks of sun west late. Cooler. Highs in the 60s to near 70, some upper 50s in the Adirondacks. Winds south to southwest near 10 mph, becoming west this afternoon.

heading: Tonight:
text: Any evening showers tapering off. Becoming partly cloudy, more periods of clouds lingering near the mountains. Lows in the 40s to low 50s. Winds west and diminishing to light.

heading: Saturday:
text: Partly sunny, then more clouds developing north, with scattered showers, especially in the afternoon, more frequent over the higher terrain. Cool. Highs in the low to mid 60s north, upper 60s to low 70s in the Champlain Valley and south. Light winds, becoming west up to 10 mph.
